fields.description: Short description for listing pages
fields.name: excerpt

fields.description: e.g., "12 months", "6-12 months"
fields.name: duration
fields.title: Program Duration

fields.description: A valid web, email, phone, or relative link.
fields.name: href
fields.title: Link

fields.description: Unique identifier for this form (e.g., "contact", "get-help", "donate-car")
fields.name: formName

fields.description: Human-readable name for this form
fields.name: displayName

fields.description: Email addresses that will receive form submissions
fields.name: recipients
fields.title: Email Recipients

fields.description: Message shown to users after successful submission
fields.name: successMessage

fields.description: Subject line for notification emails (can include {formName} placeholder)
fields.name: emailSubject
fields.title: Email Subject Template

fields.description: Send form submissions to Google Sheets (in addition to email)
fields.name: enableGoogleSheets

fields.description: The ID of the Google Sheet to send data to
fields.name: googleSheetId
fields.title: Google Sheet ID

fields.description: The name of the tab/sheet within the Google Sheet
fields.name: googleSheetTab
fields.title: Google Sheet Tab Name

fields.description: Whether this form is currently active and accepting submissions
fields.name: active

fields.description: Track clicks on this button as donation events
fields.name: trackDonation
fields.title: Track as Donation

fields.description: Short trust-building statements (e.g., "Tax-deductible", "Free pickup")
fields.name: trustIndicators

fields.description: URL to the video file (MP4 preferred)
fields.name: videoUrl
fields.title: Video URL

fields.description: Image shown while video is loading
fields.name: posterImage

fields.description: Darkness of overlay (0-100)
fields.name: overlayOpacity

fields.description: Scroll to form section instead of navigating
fields.name: scrollToForm
fields.title: Scroll to Form

fields.description: Trust indicators shown below buttons
fields.name: trustRow

fields.description: Track clicks on this button as donation events
fields.name: trackDonation
fields.title: Track as Donation

fields.description: e.g., "Graduate, Men's Program"
fields.name: role
fields.title: Role/Program

validation.message: Longer titles may be truncated in search results

fields.description: Title for search engines (50-60 characters recommended)
fields.name: metaTitle

validation.message: Longer descriptions may be truncated in search results

fields.description: Description for search engines (150-160 characters recommended)
fields.name: metaDescription

fields.description: Keywords for this page (not used by Google but helpful for organization)
fields.name: keywords

fields.description: Image for social media sharing (1200x630px recommended)
fields.name: ogImage
fields.title: Open Graph Image

fields.description: Prevent search engines from indexing this page
fields.name: noIndex
fields.title: Hide from Search Engines

fields.description: Default SEO settings for pages without custom SEO
fields.name: defaultSeo
fields.title: Default SEO

fields.description: Make this item stand out (e.g., Donate button)
fields.name: highlight

fields.description: Main donation link (e.g., givevirtuous.org)
fields.name: primaryDonationUrl

fields.name: productIds

fields.name: impactStatements
